com.ppfold.algo.extradata

Interface ExtraData


  • public interface ExtraData
    Object class to contain extra data and processing functions. The model for data interpretation has to be coded here.
    Author:
    Z.Sukosd

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      float getProbabilityGivenInnerPaired(int position1, int position2)
      Returns the probability of observing the particular data given that the nucleotide in the input position are paired with each other.
      float getProbabilityGivenOuterPaired(int position1, int position2)
      Returns the probability of observing the particular data given that the nucleotides in the input are paired with each other.
      float getProbabilityGivenUnpaired(int position)
      Returns the probability of observing the particular data given that the nucleotide in the input position is unpaired.
      int getType() 
      boolean isEmpty(int position)
      Returns whether there is missing data data in the given position.
      void readData_toStream(java.io.BufferedInputStream stream, int sequencelength)
      Has to be able to import data from a BufferedInputStream.
      void removeColumns(java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> leftoutcolumns)
      Has to be able to transform its own dataset to remove the specified columns from it.
      void transformToAlignment(java.lang.String gappedseq)
      Has to be able to transform the data for alignments.

    • Method Detail

      • getProbabilityGivenOuterPaired

        float getProbabilityGivenOuterPaired(int position1,
                                   int position2)
        Returns the probability of observing the particular data given that the nucleotides in the input are paired with each other. The position is given in ALIGNMENT coordinates so implementations of ExtraData must return values relevant for the alignment, not individual sequences.
        Parameters:
        position1 -
        position2 -

      • getProbabilityGivenInnerPaired

        float getProbabilityGivenInnerPaired(int position1,
                                   int position2)
        Returns the probability of observing the particular data given that the nucleotide in the input position are paired with each other. The position is given in ALIGNMENT coordinates so implementations of ExtraData must return values relevant for the alignment, not individual sequences.
        Parameters:
        position1 -
        position2 -

      • getProbabilityGivenUnpaired

        float getProbabilityGivenUnpaired(int position)
        Returns the probability of observing the particular data given that the nucleotide in the input position is unpaired. The position is given in ALIGNMENT coordinates so implementations of ExtraData must return values relevant for the alignment, not individual sequences.
        Parameters:
        position -

      • removeColumns

        void removeColumns(java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> leftoutcolumns)
                   throws java.lang.Exception
        Has to be able to transform its own dataset to remove the specified columns from it. (These columns are gapped in the alignment)
        Parameters:
        leftoutcolumns -
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
